description: Replace each fraction p/q in Farey tree A007305/A007306 by 2p+q.
references: J. C. Lagarias, Number Theory and Dynamical Systems, pp. 35-72 of S. A. Burr, ed., The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Number Theory, Proc. Sympos. Appl. Math., 46 (1992). Amer. Math. Soc.
author: _Gregory V. Richardson_
